item.title: 使用yeoman开发node-webkit程序
item.description: generator-node-webkit bower api#install sudo npm install -g yo bower grunt-cli gulp sudo npm install -g generator-node-webkit mkdir nwapp cd nwapp yo node-webkit ## Yeoman Steps [?] What do you want to call your app? Allowed characters ^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$ Octoo [?] A little description for your app? Markdown Note based on node-webkit [?] Would you mind telling me your username on GitHub? mfkddcwy [?] Do you want to download latest node-webkit? No [?

item.title: Yeoman安装使用
item.description: OS: Fedora 20 参考 http://yeoman.io/learning/index.html 命令 sudo npm install -g yo bower grunt-cli gulp sudo npm install -g generator-webapp mkdir yeoman cd yeoman yo webapp bower install & npm install grunt serve
